been your home: kept you satiated
protected you
been a source of peace and quiet
kept you disillusioned

the children kept playing: the ball rolled into the alley
been your home: strengthened your convictions
helped you escape the dullness of the world
so pleasantly erased your sense of self
been evicting your neighbors
been so lucrative for your community

the children kept playing: the fish fell from the sky
been your home: diligently cared for your every need
drastically reduced its own ecological footprint

the children kept playing: the can turned out to be empty
been your home: kept unwanted attention at bay
made sure to avoid dependencies on foreign land
informed your sense of self and being
never let you go hungry

the children kept playing: the mayor was replaced by this new organization
been your home: never fully revealed itself to you
made you who you are
kept your family afloat
shielded your loved ones from harm

the children kept playing: western influences faded into the ether of time
been your home: provided you with all the distractions you could hope for

the children kept playing: the locks in the city unlocked
been your home: delivered you a poem on your doorstep each day

the children kept playing: it hid its biases behind luxurious institutions
been your home: been taken over by native plants
invaded nearby towns
kept homelessness at bay
tried to get rid of its carceral system
been facing floods

the children kept playing: people started swimming in the river again
been your home: been getting evacuated
given up on the concept of privacy

the children kept playing: honey became a source of energy
been your home: been using the universal basic income
kept you connected to the world

the children kept playing: working out became compulsory for residents
been your home: facilitated trade
made it so easy to find work

the children kept playing: the first galactic city was founded
been your home: made you feel so empowered yet so vulnerable

the children kept playing: food production was shifted into the city
been your home: had made it so fun and easy to maintain it

the children kept playing: the city grew into the sea
the self-driving garbage truck rammed the parliament
